title: Cinderhulk BUG, aura dissapearing as jungle malphite @ approx 25 mins, unable to restore
body: Wondering if anyone else has experienced such an issue or if it was a unique occurence?

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
